title: Orange Vanilla Coffee Syrup
directions: Combine sugar and water in a small saucepan. Heat over medium heat, stirring until sugar dissolves.
Add orange zest and fresh orange juice. Simmer gently for 5-10 minutes to infuse the citrus flavor.
Remove from heat and stir in vanilla extract.
Strain through a fine-mesh sieve to remove zest pieces.
Let cool to room temperature before bottling. Store in the fridge for up to 2 weeks.
notes: Straining is important to prevent zest from clogging syrup dispensers. Orange juice alone is not a sufficient preservative - add 1 tsp lemon juice or 1 tbsp vodka to extend shelf life. For a thicker syrup, use a 2:1 sugar-to-water ratio. Pairs beautifully with Honey Syrup in lattes (2 parts honey to 1 part orange vanilla). Heat to 190-200F but avoid boiling.
